name: TargetRecruit
overview:
Build Efficiency into your hiring process.

TargetRecruit helps add efficiency to hiring process by automation and integration. TargetRecruit is build on force.complatform with very high adoption and retention rate. It provides a centralized system for sales and recruiting with extended applications to go beyond traditional recruiting with intelligent and customizable reports, dashboards and analytics.

SaaS (Software as a Service) allows access to the business applications and related services over the Internet that would otherwise have to be located on the company’s own personal or enterprise computers.

Since, TargetRecruit has been designed on the SaaS architecture it enjoys unprecedented flexibility in application deployment and customization, shorter implementation cycles, and guaranteed up-time.
